TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ScrollView extends Android.Widget.FrameLayout

Docs.summary: You can call this function yourself to have the scroll view perform scrolling from a key event, just as if the event had been dispatched to it by the view hierarchy.
Docs.returns: Return true if the event was handled, else false.

Docs.summary: Indicates whether this ScrollView's content is stretched to fill the viewport. -or- Indicates this ScrollView whether it should stretch its content height to fill the viewport or not.
Docs.value: True if the content fills the viewport, false otherwise.
